attributes.action: stop tickets touts buying all the concert tickets and selling them at hugely inflated prices on Ebay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am sick of not being able to buy concert tickets at the face value because as soon as they go on sale the touts buy them all unfairly and then sell them on Ebay at vast profit, leaving genuine fans ticketless or out of pocket
Take That tickets sold out - how? All the legitimate ticket agencies' websites crashed so how did people manage to buy them. I don't think there is an even footing here for fans to buy tickets - I think the touts hack into the sites and block genuine fans from buying. Please do something to stop this expoitation immediately!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
